4.2. mime_multipart¶

4.2.1. Module d1_common.mime_multipart¶

Wrap files and return the file data wrapped in a mime multipart structure when iterated, without buffering.

Created:

2010-09-07
Author:

DataONE (dahl, vieglais)
Dependencies:
  • python 2.6

Classes

multipart(fields, files[, chunk_size]) Generate a MIME Multipart document based on a set of files and fields.
